entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: Allow specifying directory for Source Generator emitted files #66122
  • [Hot Reload] Editing switch expression at fly requires rebuild even if you remove only whitespace from code. #66120
  • SyntaxGenerator.Argument doesn't generate RefKind.In properly #66118
  • Long switch expression is duplicated in `InferTypesWorker_DoNotCallDirectly` overloads #66116

Closed

  • Expression Evaluator Regression - Expression Evaluation in Watch seems to do not take usings into account #61914
    17.4
  • IDE0031 codefix shouldn't remove existing braces #66036
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66121
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Keep the block of else-if statement in "Use null propogation" codefix #66048
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Do not treat enum base list as type context for completions #66119
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Do not suggest `required` after `async` and vise versa #66090
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Qualify `Task.FromResult` when removing `async` modifier #66114
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE
